abstract: Philippines President-elect Rodrigo Duterte, in sharp contrast to current policies, plans to bring back death penalty, offer cabinet posts to communist rebels and move to amend Constitution to give more power to provinces.

headline.print_headline: Philippines’ New Leader Plans to Hang Killers, Twice, to Fight Crime
headline.main: Rodrigo Duterte, Philippines’ New Leader, Plans to Reinstate Death Penalty

snippet: Rodrigo Duterte, the nation’s presumptive president, said Monday that murderers, robbers and rapists should be hanged twice, until their heads are severed.
lead_paragraph: Rodrigo Duterte, the nation’s presumptive president, said Monday that murderers, robbers and rapists should be hanged twice, until their heads are severed.
